nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Someone leaves a hurtful note in your locker. It stings more because it was anonymous.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Why would someone do this? Should I tell a teacher?

choices.text: Show it to a teacher and ask for help.
Ignore it and keep it to yourself.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The teacher listens and takes steps to stop the behavior. You feel safer but still shaken.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The person denies it; the moment becomes tense. You feel both relief and regret afterward.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Keeping it inside makes it heavier. Later someone close notices your mood and asks about it.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Asking for help doesn't make me weak. Choosing who to trust matters.
